overview:
Accomplished software executive with a diverse background in the information technology, financial services and aviation industries. Expert in managing large scale programs, new product introductions, financial transactions and social media initiatives. Sophisticated international experience. Specialties:

Software product management, solution development, business development, marketing, social networking, alliances, partnerships, channel management, project management, corporate finance, financial analysis, treasury and accounting. CPA (inactive). Significant international business skills and experience.

degrees.subject: Finance
degrees.institution: The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania
